hints.content:
Area is the number of square units that cover a shape.

We need to find a rectangle with the same area.

Let's imagine that we finish drawing the unit squares in the rectangle.

- How many rows of unit squares would there be? 

- How many unit squares would be in each row?

[[☃ image 1]]

The rectangle has $\blueE{8}$ rows with $\maroonD{5}$ unit squares per row.

options.alt: A rectangle covered by a grid of unit squares with 8 rows and 5 columns. A curved bracket across the bottom of the rectangle is labeled 5 and a curved bracket to the right side of the rectangle is labeled 8. !

hints.content:
We would use the same number of unit squares to cover this rectangle, so it would have the same area:

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A rectangle with the right side labeled 8 units and the bottom side labeled 5 units. !

question.content:
The following rectangle is partially covered with unit squares.

[[☃ image 1]]

**Which figure has the same area as the rectangle above?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

options.alt: A rectangle divided by a partially complete grid of unit squares with 8 rows and 5 columns. Part of the rectangle is divided into 12 equal-sized squares. The remainder of the rectangle shows partially drawn rows and columns. !

choices.content: ![A rectangle with the right side labeled 8 units and the bottom side labeled 5 units.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/f66cc8aaf1cc4af1590cb629cd1aef13d75a2143)
![A rectangle with the right side labeled 7 units and the bottom side labeled 4 units.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/781da46dfc6e8f18ca63811ed35442f7b529bfc4)
![A rectangle with the right side labeled 8 units and the bottom side labeled 4 units.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/645ca203606f09b52b425da844db75c1ef064266)
![A rectangle with the right side labeled 7 units and the bottom side labeled 5 units.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a9148c30cd615ccaae49aed92b9c0ebfde1f32f7)
